channel.title: contributor.info Changelog
channel.description: All notable changes to contributor.info - the platform for understanding open source repository health and dynamics.

item.title: Version 4.27.2 - 2026-01-14
item.content:encoded:
Version 4.27.2

Released on 2026-01-14

üêõ Bug Fixes
